content.prompt: Which of the following realities would NOT be accounted for by the theoretical predictions shown on the map?

choices.label: Oregon has established a Forest Resources Institute.
New Jersey’s nickname is the Garden State.
Florida’s government has a Department of Citrus.
The first cheese factory in the United States was near Rome, New York.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Describe the spatial patterns presented in visual sources.
